'''Lyney''' is a playable {{Pneuma}}-aligned {{Pyro}} [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

Skilled and eloquent, Lyney is [[Fontaine]]'s Great Magician and [[Lynette]]'s twin brother. After their parents' death and having been saved from an abusive noble by their "[[Arlecchino|Father]]," Lyney has undertaken missions for the [[House of the Hearth]] and has said that he will eventually become the successor of "Father."
